channel.title: If u dont have router u cant make server online?
channel.description: as it says above.... if u dont have router u cant make server online??

item.title: If u dont have router u cant make server online?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Alright, you’re welcome. I’ll help you with hamachi now then lol…Trust me, I remember when I wanted my server up and running and I finally got it up and I was sooo happy lol, hehe…So, here we go:

Alright, this TuT will teach you how to create your own private server with the use of Hamachi.

First of all, you need to download the newest version of Java JDK (http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp).

After you get there, scroll down about 2 inches and click the first “>> download” button you see.

The installation may take a while…be patient…

Alright, so now we’re done with that.

Now you have to get a source…

You can get one at The MoparScape Downloads List (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html).

I suggest PimpScape, But you could also start out with testscape or p16.

After downloading, you need to make the source…uhh…work…

So, unzip your source file with WinRar (if you dont already have WinRar, Download it Here: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm)

right click a java file, and click open with…

Select notepad from the menu, and click the box that says “always use this program with these types of files” or something like that.

Do the same with .CFG files.

Now, we need a working compiler/runserver.

I suggest Mod Taharok’s ‘Perfect’ Compiler V 1.9 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html)

Great, now all we need to do is get the server online.

First we’ll Download Hamachi ( www.hamachi.cc ). If you dont already have it, I don’t see how you ever found out about DudeWtfScape, seeing as it’s on a Hamachi Network…

close off the tutorial.

Now, you need to create a network.

Click the little triangly looking button thing, and click create new network.

Now put in the name and password (CASE SENSITIVE!)

Ok, now you have a network.

Now to run the server.

If you dont already, you need to Download The MoparScape Client ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html ).

Now that you’ve got that too, you need to run the server. double click the compiler in your source, and type “c” and enter (If you’re using Mod Taharok’s Compiler).

After that finishes press any key to continue and press “r” and enter.

YAY! now your server is running!

All you have to do now is, on The MoparScape Client, make a username and password, and where it says IP, type the huge white numbers at the top of the Hamachi Window.

TADA! you now have a server!

Need any further help? Post here or PM me.

Read full topic

item.source: If u dont have router u cant make server online?

item.title: If u dont have router u cant make server online?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

It’s ok azpker1, I’m nice and helpful unlike the above posts ^^^ cough

Okay, step 1:

Go to www.no-ip.com

Sign up there. Then log in. And you should see your ip address on there (left hand screen)…copy it.

Now…click the add button on the left side(it is a sidelink on the left side of your screen)

Then hostname is the the name then .no-ip.info… e.g. mine is strandedisle so i chose the network and it is now (strandedisle.no-ip.info)

The ip address may already be there, so you don’t have to paste it, but if it is not then go ahead and paste it in there.

Scroll down and click on ‘create host.’

There you go. You got your no-ip make sure you download their ‘no-ip DUC’ as you will need it to check up on your hosts.

~Rudolph~

Read full topic
